about_the_game:
Miuratale: Dive into Adventure

In a boundless underwater world, three mermaid kingdoms—the Miura, Seeka, and Atla—struggle for unity amidst a rising tide of darkness. A mysterious power returns, threatening to engulf the seas. Only a Trident Warrior can stand against the tide, and this time fate has called upon an unlikely hero to wield its immense power.

Join Keena as she journeys across the sunken world of Aegea and discover ancient treasures, powerful relics, friends, allies, and enemies.

Key Features:

  • Explore the Unknown: From vibrant reefs to haunting abysses, navigate a world teeming with secrets, trials, and treasures as Keena dives deeper into danger!

  • Dynamic Combat: Master the power of the Spirit Trident with fast , fluid action. Unlock elemental abilities, powerful special abilities, and take on the chaotic enemies of Corruption!

  • Expressive Customization: Collecting resources all over the seabed and craft armor in your workshop, brew potions in your laboratory, and cook stat boosting meals in your cookery!

  • A New Mermaid World: Unravel a total new universe inspired by Greek mythology and mermaid culture. Meet the various mermaid cultures of the sea and learn their history in a 50,000+ word script!

  • Underwater Puzzles: Take on challenges from the gods, navigate ancient technology, and solve the Siren Seal's as you discover the mechanism's of an primordial enemy.

Will Keena rise above the waves of darkness, or will the ocean’s final light fade forever? Find out in Miuratale.
